text: Animated Violence Mild is the fourth studio album by British electronic musician Blanck Mass. It was released on 16 August 2019 under Sacred Bones Records. ==Accolades== {|class="wikitable sortable" |+Accolades for Animated Violence Mild |- ! Publication ! Accolade ! Rank ! class="unsortable"| |- | BrooklynVegan | Top 50 Albums of 2019 | | |- | DJ Mag | Top 50 Albums of 2019 | | |- | MusicOMH | Top 50 Albums of 2019 | | |- | No Ripcord | Top 50 Albums of 2019 | | |- | PopMatters | Top 70 Albums of 2019 | | |- | Treble | Top 50 Albums of 2019 | | |- | Under the Radar | Top 100 Albums of 2019 | | |} ==Critical reception== Animated Violence Mild was met with generally favourable reviews from critics. At Metacritic, which assigns a weighted average rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream publications, this release received an average score of 80, based on 20 reviews. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |+Chart performance for Animated Violence Mild |- ! Chart (2019) ! Peak position |- |- |} ==References== Category:2019 albums Category:Blanck Mass albums Category:Sacred Bones Records albums
title: Animated Violence Mild
